content: leverly placed cables create an adorable owl on the front of the owl be calling cell phone cozy a quick gift knit for someone special or yourself it is sure to bring a smile to the recipient s face this cellphone cozy is worked seamlessly in the round from the bottom up a loop closure is worked separately and sewn inside the center back buttons are sewn on for owl eyes and loop closure the height of cozy can be modified by changing the number of rounds of seed stitch in the top and/or bottom borders
